name: RPG Pals Club: Between a Rock and a Dark Place
name_original: RPG Pals Club: Between a Rock and a Dark Place
description:
THIS PROJECT IS CURRENTLY BEING UPDATED

Between a Rock and a Dark Place is a Visual Novel inspired by the Actual Play podcast RPG Pals Club! 

Written by Eric aka Rhythm Bastard, find out what happened to Oi, the punk drow monk, before the campaign started. Get to learn more about his life in the underdark and more about why he left for Waterdeep.

This is a side project done for his Patreon, so if you want the LATEST version, you can become a Patron right now and get the latest updates.

Made in Godot Engine with Dialogic. Will update Public Version after the Patreon version.
